title: Chex Mix- Jada
directions: Melt butter in a baking pan. Stir butter, garlic powder and Worcestershire sauce until mixed.
Add cereal, pretzels, and peanuts. Stir gently. Bake for 15 mins.
Stir, then bake for another 15 mins.
ingredients: Pretzels (I use 2 types for interest. Add as many as desired.)
